alert.note: Alert for Logan; McDowell; Mingo; Wyoming (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central McDowell, southeastern Mingo, southeastern Logan and northwestern Wyoming Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 603 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mallory, or 14 miles southeast of Logan, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pineville, Oceana, Man, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Mallory, Gilbert Creek, Hinch, Amherstdale-Robinette, Gilbert, Clear Fork, Coal Mountain, Hampden, Pie, Bruno and Baileysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
